# MY MENU

Access a personalized menu of frequently-used options.

To display ‚Äúmy menu‚Äù, press **MENU/OK** in the shooting display and select the !MY MENU tab.

!My Menu Display

> üí° **Note:**  
> The !MY tab is only available if options have been assigned to MY MENU.

## MY MENU SETTING

To choose the items listed in the !MY MENU tab:

1. In the setup menu, select !User Setting Icon **USER SETTING** > !My Menu Setting Icon **MY MENU SETTING** or !My Menu Setting Icon **MY MENU SETTING**.

   !My Menu Setting Display

   > üí° **Tip:**  
   > To reorder items, select **RANK ITEMS**. To delete items, select **REMOVE ITEMS**.

2. Press the focus stick (focus lever) up or down to highlight **ADD ITEMS** and press **MENU/OK**. Options that can be added to ‚Äúmy menu‚Äù are highlighted in blue.

   !Add Items Display

   > üí° **Note:**  
   > Items currently in ‚Äúmy menu‚Äù are indicated by check marks.
